overview: Experience all 10 rounds of the exhilarating battle for the 1994 World Rally Championship on DVD for the first time. The action-packed and extensive review recalls the fast and furious chase for the titles, which was decided at the final round. This is a chance to see legends including the late, great Colin McRae, Francois Delecour, Carlos Sainz and Didier Auriol in stunning form, including on-board footage.
title: WRC 1994 - FIA World Rally Championship
